title: Loss Preventor for Ranked
body: It is very frustrating when someone on your teams afk's on a ranked game because it doesn't matter how strong you are 9/10 you are going to lose the game due to not having that extra person and I strongly believe they should have a loss preventor put in place so that no LP is lost when a person on your team decides to quit. Stats should still be recorded but all lp loss is nulled.

replies.body: And then people just AFK whenever they feel like they're going to lose so they don't actually lose. Even if only the person who left lost their LP, there's people who wouldn't mind taking the bullet and leaving for their team.
Or you could just bully someone till they rage quit
